cause.description:
自清末以來,中國飽受外國列強侵擾,受到船堅砲利的威逼下,西方的文化才慢慢引入,但政制體制仍然是守舊不變,從康有為等人抱有希望的君主立憲,到孫文的民主共和,最後是毛澤東的共產革命,都沒有真正改變中國命運,中國始終走不出自己的圈子,百年的內亂外患沒有給中國人帶來教訓,我們不但沒有好好保留優良的中華文化,連真正的西方民主共和都搞得不倫不類.昨日堂堂天朝大國,今日被昔日的朝貢國日韓踩在頭上. 中國人,醒醒吧,不管是共和,聯邦還是君主立憲,我們都是為爭取中國實現真正的民主而驕傲! 註1:我們不是分裂國家,我們只想中國變成民主自由的國家. 台灣和西藏自古是中國領土不可分割的一部分! 註2:中英文版可能有差別,英文注釋鳴謝Andrew Christian Miller.
Since the end of Qing/T'sing Dynasty, China and its people have suffered from invasion and subjugation at the hands of foreign powers. As the nation slowly began to Westernize itself,the political system remained in turmoil. The consolidation of power by Mao Zedong and the Chinese Communist Party would lead to decades of totalitarian control over the Chinese people, reaching its zenith during the Cultural Revolution. After the death of Mao, China took a new path to reform its economy under Deng Xiaoping which radically liberalized China's economic policies. Sadly, while China has embraced economic liberalism, it has held on to political totalitarianism. The Chinese people deserve and have a right to better governance than this. We strive for China to realize its true potential to become a true democracy.
Our Positions: 1. End the suppression of factions opposed to the CPP. 2. See through the true implementation of constitutional government and legalize the right to form political parties of all stripes. 3. Open up the government and national military to public scrutiny. 4. Legalize full freedom of speech and assembly. 5. Legalize freedom of the press.
Note 1 : We are not anti-China. We only hope China transforms into a free and democratic country with an accountable government.
Note 2 : The Chinese and English text may have some differences in but have the same point. Special thanks to Andrew Christian Miller for the English outreach.
1. 解除黨禁,報禁,新聞審查
2. 實行憲政,開放選舉
3. 政府,軍隊國家化
4. 開放言論自由,人民集會結社遊行權力
cause.mission: 爭取中國實現民主政體-China should be a democracy
cause.name: 民主自由中國-Democratic China
